ygData.subject: Zimbra REST interface
ygData.msgSnippet: This REST-based API actually looks pretty good. http://wiki.zimbra.com/index.php?title=User_Migration#REST_overview though I don t think much of the name.  It

This REST-based API actually looks pretty good.

    http://wiki.zimbra.com/index.php?title=User_Migration#REST_overview

though I don't think much of the name.  It certainly would make me much
more inclined to use a Zimbra server than other collaboration servers.

....Roy
